Fit TOP model using JAGS with R2jags package

Source: R/fit_TOP_model_jags.R
fit_TOP_jags.Rd

Fit TOP model using JAGS with R2jags package

fit_TOP_jags(
  data.train,
  TOP.model,
  parameters.to.save,
  n.iter = 1e+05,
  n.burnin = 5000,
  n.thin = 2,
  n.chains = 1,
  DIC = TRUE
)

Arguments

data.train

combined training data.

TOP.model

TOP model written in BUGS code.

parameters.to.save

character vector of the names of the parameters to save which should be monitored.

n.iter

number of total iterations per chain (including burn in).

n.burnin

length of burn in, i.e. number of iterations to discard at the beginning.

n.thin

thinning rate, must be a positive integer.

n.chains

number of Markov chains.

DIC

logical; if TRUE (default), compute deviance, pD, and DIC.

Value

Contents

Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Jianling Zhong, Alex Hartemink.
